title: Cursive / Script / Tattoo
content:
The Image consists of two different fonts which were mixed up in a beautiful design. Has anybody an idea how these two fonts are called and if they can be purchased online or downloaded for free?

Many thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stock-vector-self-made-old-english-fine-line-tattoo-writing-97209281_4633.jpg)

Font: 

 Multiple fonts 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: new_babylon

comments.content:
Most probably all custom lettering and having a look to Pavel Shevcov 'therealtakeone' [portfolio](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.shutterstock.com/gallery-468943p1.html) (or [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/atwork.lv/users/takeone)) could confirm it.  
'Forgives' reminds me a bit of Great Lakes lettering [Asterism](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/great-lakes-lettering/asterism) and [Feast](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/great-lakes-lettering/feast).  
 [Sepian](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/sepian) might work for 'I dont'.  
Having a look to fonts tagged ' [tattoo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Atattoo)' might worth a shot.
Thank you @Ryuk for your highly informative and qualified response. The issue is resolved.

The top and bottom are calligraphy in decorative blackletter styles. They are two different different designs. Nothing really matches either one.  
But here are some fancy blackletter fonts that have some similarities:  
Beckinslade [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/beckinslade/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/beckinslade/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/beckinslade/")  
Black Swan BF [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bomparte/black-swan/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bomparte/black-swan/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bomparte/black-swan/")  
Monkeytails [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/monkeytails/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/monkeytails/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/monkeytails/")  
Kingthings Spike [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/kingthings-spike-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/kingthings-spike-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/kingthings-spike-pro/")  
KingthingsSpikeless [http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Kingthings-Spikeless](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Kingthings-Spikeless "http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Kingthings-Spikeless")  
Baroque Text JF [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jawfonts/baroque-text-jf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jawfonts/baroque-text-jf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jawfonts/baroque-text-jf/")  
Aeronaut [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/facetype/aeronaut/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/facetype/aeronaut/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/facetype/aeronaut/")  
Rheingold [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/rheingold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/rheingold/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/rheingold/")  
Carol [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/classic/carol/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/classic/carol/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/classic/carol/")  
Celebration [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/rmu/celebration/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/rmu/celebration/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/rmu/celebration/")  
Savoy [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/classic/savoy/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/classic/savoy/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/classic/savoy/")  
Uthan [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/uthan/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/uthan/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/uthan/")  
Sepian -- already suggested by Ryuk -- [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/sepian/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/sepian/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/sepian/")  
Dearest [http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Dearest](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Dearest "http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Dearest")  
Portcullion [http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Portcullion](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Portcullion "http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Portcullion")  
Zenda [http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Zenda](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Zenda "http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Zenda")  
Kelly Ann Gothic [http://www.dafont.com/kelly-ann-gothic.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/www.dafont.com/kelly-ann-gothic.font "http://www.dafont.com/kelly-ann-gothic.font")  
You might also browse through an interesting collection of free fonts by Paul Lloyd which includes some interesting fancy blacketters [http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131432/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/ "http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/")  
Don
Many thanks to @donshottype you've got a great collection there. Your help is greatly appreciated!!
